column2: Building this magnificient clock tower to accompany the reconstruction of the Palace of Westminster which was largely destroyed by a fire in 1834 would increase the prestige of our nation and bolster $COUNTRY_ADJ$ identity.
Building this great lattice tower in Paris would show the world what $COUNTRY_ADJ$ engineering can achieve and provide an impressive and prestigious landmark for the city.
The Eiffer Tower has been built in Paris.
The Eiffer Tower has been built in Paris.
The Eiffel Tower has been built
Big Ben has been built in London.
Big Ben has been built in London.

Following the rise of the recent Indian independence movement led by Mahatma Gandhi the Mohammedian people of India have started to campaign for a country of their own should India be declared a free nation. Naturally the nation would be carved out of our North-Western Indian posessions as it is the region with the largest concentration of Moslems. The movement has become widespread and gained in radicalism over the years, should we not promise them their nation we can expect an increase in tensions between the Moslem Indians and their Hindu neighbours.

The world trade centre in our biggest city has this morning been the object of the worst and most extensive attack carried out on $COUNTRY_ADJ$ soil by terrorists. Hundreds are dead and many more are missing, the city will take months before fully recovering and it is feared that the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people will never fully recover from the shock, this undoubtedly marks the beginning of a new era in international affairs. The suspected leader of the attack, a member of a wealthy arabic family, has reportedly fled to Afghanistan where islamic militants offered him refuge. Conservative elements in our nation call for swift and indiscriminate action against the suspects and a tightening of nation-wide security, while the opposition urges caution in our response to these acts.
The issue has divided the nation in recent months. What shall be the government's position?
This is hardly important is it?
Using people across the nation as test subjects could boost our research potential, however it is unlikely to go down well with the populace and the international community.

Zionism, a Jewish Movement advocating a 'return' of Jews to their ancestral homeland, has grown in popularity over the years and many Jewish organisations are now offering to send migrants there. It is said that the rise of zionism is partly due to increasing intolerance by nationalist elements in European nations, who view Jews as profiteering internationalists due to their nomadic nature and close ties with the banking profession.

It has recently come to our attention that many unhappy Jews living in $COUNTRY$ are leaving for Palestine. They call the migration 'Aliyah', an hebrew word meaning 'ascent'. According to them God has promised the land to the Jewish people and they are merely returning to their home country.
I doubt the locals will approve!

Recent Jewish immigrants from Europe have met stiff opposition from the local muslim community in recent times, they resent the nationalist zionist cause and have responded with their own national claim on Palestine. It is feared that this conflict could escalate into a full-blown civil war.
Stop Jewish immigrants from landing in Palestine
These Moslems must learn to share
Years of labour and diplomacy have finally resulted in the abolition of European nation states, all members of the European Union will now become mere regions of the EU superstate
Let's give the keys to the EU, there will be no more $COUNTRY$.
Initiate Drone Campaign in Abu Dhabi
A drone campaign would help counter insurgents in this country and stabilise the region.

Angered by what they see as Western decadence, imperialism and oppression of muslims worldwide, many of our citizens are joining organisations determined to fight Western influence and replace it with the strictest islamic code of conduct. They also believe in the restoration of the old islamic caliphate and its eventual expansion.
A $COUNTRY_ADJ$ national has been rescued from a tiny island in the middle of the ocean. His miraculous survival and rescue are inspiring people worldwide.
Mr. President, rumours of inadequate relations with a White House intern, Ms. Lewinsky, and you have triggered a media storm.
It has been revealed that our administration is wire-tapping opponents in order to blackmail them. Following calls for his impeachment President Nixon had no choice but to resign.

Left-wing activists and the Afro-American community in this country are protesting after neighbourhood watch George Zimmerman, who killed a 17-year old black man apparently in self-defense was acquitted in court today. They claim the acquital shows that racism is still alive in $COUNTRY$ and will not back down until Zimmerman is sent to prison. The case has the potential to cause riots all over the nation.

A dispute over land usage around a mohawk reserve near Oka has degenerated into a full-blown Indian revolt. They have set up barricades on bridges and key roads leading into Oka and now threaten to rise up and wage war against $COUNTRY_ADJ$ people if we don't back down.
John G. Diefenbaker was elected Prime Minister of Canada. His strongly nationalist ideals and uncompromising stance regarding Canada's Southern neighbour is sure to benefit the nation.
I am not anti-American. But I am strongly pro-Canadian
The last war was a disaster for Europe, if this group of nations is to survive in this ever-changing world it must unite behind a common cause, and possibly, a common flag.
Uranium, a rare metal, electric components and machine parts are needed to produce nuclear weapons.
Glass, electric gear, rubber and rare metals are needed to produce computers.
Islamists have for goal the institution of Sharia law and therefore will always back the implemention of reactionary political and social reforms.

A new ideology based on the the islamic religion has surfaced. Frustrated by colonial occupation and driven to zeal by the lack of access to basic needs, many muslims are now turning to islamism. This ideology has for goal the establishment of a fundamentalist society based entirely on a strict religious code known as 'Sharia law'
Sunni Islamists are zealous jihadis who wage war on those they see as a threat to their religion. They seek to convert others to their cause by force.
Recent developments leave no doubts in anyone's mind, $COUNTRY$ has truly become a world superpower. Our nation now shines like no other and as such we are expected to set an example for the world.
Despite our best efforts it seems like our time as a world superpower has come to an end.
Indian Nationalists have for goal the liberation and union of all of India.
Our close ties with Britain allows us to join the British Commonwealth of Nations.

Having successfully united Scandinavia we are now witnessing a dynamic revival of its culture. This has led to a curious occurence whereby several individuals in our ruling elite have gone back to the old Norse faith, rejecting Christianity as a corrupt Southern religion. We could ourselves adopt this religion on behalf of the country.

Having successfully created a new Roman Empire we are now witnessing a dynamic revival of its culture. This has led to a curious occurence whereby several individuals in our ruling elite have gone back to the old Roman faith, rejecting Christianity as a corrupt religion. We could ourselves adopt this religion on behalf of the country.
We could allocate some money to fund a program to encourage our subjects to convert to our religion.
We are encouraging our subjects to convert to our pagan beliefs.
As an Italian great power in posession of Rome we are in a position to create a new Roman Empire based on its ancient and glorious values and the new ideas of the modern world.
We were forced by a foreign nation to abolish slavery.

Texas, a colony of ours was highly unpopulated until now. Many of our protestant population started to leave the homeland for the brighter future in the border of the newly formed United States of America, hoping for a better life than they had in their birthplace, Europe.

After the recent defeat the Second Empire got destabilized and people have lost their faith in France ever becoming as strong as under the rule of the great Napoleon Bonaparte. With no other choice we have to declare the state a democracy once again, the third in the history of our nation.
